channel.title: About on Alexander von Boguszewski
channel.description: Recent content in About on Alexander von Boguszewski

item.title: Saxess Software Design
item.description: At Saxess I developed complex data transformations with Java and XSLT 2.0 to enable access to different databases, catalogs and web services via a single API gateway.

item.title: Fraunhofer IAIS
item.description: I worked as Project member in the multinational EU research project IRRIIS - Integrated Risk Reduction of Information-based Infrastructure Systems - on an event based simulation of conected critical infrastructures. Within the project I worked in a Team which implements the simulation environment in Java.

item.title: Bonn-Rhein-Sieg University
item.description: I have finished study Computer Science at the Bonn-Rhein-Sieg University of Applied Sciences as a Master of Science in Computer Science.

item.title: NTT Data
item.description: At NTT DATA I acting as Leading Developer in several application and process integration projects at customeres in the finance sector. I act as a Software Developer with open source technologies like Apache Camel or JBoss Drools. Among other things, I worked in the DevOps team on the development of an open source integration environment for an investment company, supported a leading securities settlement service provider in a digitization project as a coach or designed the processes in a BPM project for one of the leading derivatives exchanges as a software architect.

item.title: Scrum Master
item.description: I got a Scrum Master Certificate in May 2013.

item.title: Koblenz University
item.description: In addition to my duties as a consultant at NTT Data, I have been studying business administration in distance learning.

item.title: TIBCO
item.description: As an IT architect at TIBCO, I was the direct customer contact at a German railway company and responsible for technical questions regarding the further development and operation of the TIBCO Enterprise Integration Platform, regular agreements on deadlines, project status and risks. I was also involved in coordinating the onsite team and monitoring the status of the individual subprojects. Later, as Delivery Manager, I was responsible for the management of Professional Services for several major customers in Germany and Eastern Europe.

item.title: Talend
item.description: At Talend, I help our clients process their data more effectively by helping them choose the right tools, build the necessary infrastructure and provide the expertise for that. As a Delivery Manager, I am responsible for setting up, managing and completing our Professional Service projects for various customers. My current focus is to reconcile the wishes and requirements of Talend’s customers, project managers and local consultants and PS organization and to successfully complete my customer projects on time, within budget and to the highest quality.
